summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 4 Module A: ARRIS Pattern Engine Dashboard. All 35 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with all 5 tabs (Overview, Patterns, Cohorts, Rankings, Churn Risk) displaying correct data and visualizations.
passed_tests: Backend: All 7 Pattern Engine endpoints require authentication (401/403 for unauthenticated)
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/overview returns 200 with snapshot, activity_30d, health_indicators
Backend: Overview snapshot contains total_creators, total_proposals, active_subscriptions, timestamp
Backend: Overview activity_30d contains new_proposals, new_registrations, growth percentages
Backend: Overview health_indicators contains overall, engagement, success, revenue scores and status
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/detect returns 200 with all pattern categories
Backend: Detect returns success_patterns, risk_patterns, churn_patterns, revenue_patterns, engagement_patterns
Backend: Pattern structure includes title, description, confidence (0-1)
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/cohorts returns 200 with tier, engagement, monthly analysis
Backend: Cohorts by_tier contains count, total_proposals, avg_proposals_per_creator, approval_rate
Backend: Cohorts by_engagement contains highly_engaged, moderately_engaged, low_engaged, inactive
Backend: Cohorts by_registration_month contains month, count, retained, churned, retention_rate
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/rankings returns 200 with list of creators
Backend: Rankings creator structure includes creator_id, name, email, tier, total_proposals, approved_proposals, approval_rate
Backend: Rankings sort_by=approval_rate works correctly
Backend: Rankings sort_by=total_proposals works correctly
Backend: Rankings tier filter works correctly
Backend: Rankings limit parameter works correctly
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/revenue returns 200 with summary and monthly_trend
Backend: Revenue summary contains total_revenue, total_expenses, net_profit, profit_margin, mrr, arr, active_subscriptions
Backend: Revenue monthly_trend contains month and revenue data
Backend: Revenue period_days parameter works correctly
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/insights returns 200 with list of actionable insights
Backend: Insights structure includes id, type (warning/success/opportunity), priority (high/medium/low), title, description
Backend: GET /api/admin/patterns/churn-risk returns 200 with risk counts and at_risk_creators
Backend: Churn-risk contains total_at_risk, high_risk_count, medium_risk_count, detected_at
Backend: At-risk creators include creator_id, creator_name, risk_score, risk_level, risk_factors, recommendation
Frontend: Admin Pattern Dashboard loads successfully at /admin/patterns
Frontend: All 5 tabs present (Overview, Patterns, Cohorts, Rankings, Churn Risk)
Frontend: Overview tab shows Platform Health indicators with scores and status badge
Frontend: Overview tab shows key metrics cards (Creators, Proposals, Subscriptions, MRR)
Frontend: Overview tab shows 30-Day Activity section
Frontend: Actionable Insights cards display with priority badges (HIGH/MEDIUM)
Frontend: Patterns tab shows Success Patterns, Risk Patterns, Engagement Patterns, Revenue Patterns sections
Frontend: Cohorts tab shows Creator Distribution by Tier pie chart
Frontend: Cohorts tab shows Engagement Levels breakdown
Frontend: Rankings tab shows Top Creators list with tier badges and approval rates
Frontend: Rankings tab has sort dropdown (Approval Rate, Total Proposals, Approved)
Frontend: Rankings tab has tier filter dropdown (All Tiers, Free, Starter, Pro, Premium, Elite)
Frontend: Churn Risk tab shows High Risk, Medium Risk, Total At Risk counts
Frontend: Churn Risk tab shows At-Risk Creators list with risk scores and factors
Frontend: Refresh button works and reloads data
critical_code_review_comments: ArrisPatternEngine class properly implements all pattern detection methods with MongoDB aggregation pipelines
Pattern detection includes success, risk, churn, revenue, engagement, and trend patterns
Health indicators calculated from engagement rate, approval rate, and subscription coverage
Cohort analysis properly groups creators by tier, registration month, and engagement level
Creator rankings support sorting by approval_rate, total_proposals, approved_proposals with tier filtering
Revenue analysis calculates MRR/ARR from subscription tier pricing
Churn risk detection uses multi-factor scoring (no proposals, no subscription, low tier)
Actionable insights generated from detected patterns with priority levels
All endpoints properly require admin authentication via get_current_user
Frontend AdminPatternDashboard fetches all 7 endpoints in parallel for performance
data-testid attributes present on key elements for testing
Recharts library used for pie charts and bar charts in Cohorts tab
Health indicator circles use color coding (green/yellow/orange/red) based on score
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing creators and proposals
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 4 Module A ARRIS Pattern Engine Dashboard fully tested. 7 admin-only endpoints at /api/admin/patterns/* (overview, detect, cohorts, rankings, revenue, insights, churn-risk). Frontend component AdminPatternDashboard.js with 5 tabs. Pattern Engine initialized at server startup and uses MongoDB aggregation for analytics. All data is real from MongoDB (no mocking). Health indicators show platform status (excellent/good/fair/needs_attention). Churn risk detection identifies creators with no proposals, no subscription, or low engagement.
